sentences.en: ‘I won't discuss it.’ ‘Don't then—&B{it's your funeral}.’.
sentences.cn: “我不想谈这事。”“那就别谈——后果你自己负责。”。

sentences.en: A clergyman friend of the family conducted the funeral.
sentences.cn: 这家人的一位牧师朋友主持了这场葬礼.

sentences.en: At her funeral her oldest friend paid tribute to her life and work.
sentences.cn: 在葬礼上，她最早的朋友对她的一生和工作给予了高度的赞扬。

sentences.en: Bishop Silvester officiated at the funeral.
sentences.cn: 西尔韦斯特主教主持了葬礼。

sentences.en: First, think about what you’d like people to say about you at your funeral.
sentences.cn: 首先，想象一下在你的葬礼上，你希望自己喜欢的人们会怎样评你。

sentences.en: He asked for no funeral oration.
sentences.cn: 他不要人在葬礼上宣读悼词.

sentences.en: Her bright clothes were not appropriate for a funeral.
sentences.cn: 她那身鲜艳的衣服不适合参加葬礼.

sentences.en: His funeral will be on Thursday at Blackburn Cathedral.
sentences.cn: 他的葬礼将于星期四在布莱克本大教堂举行。

sentences.en: Hundreds of mourners attended the funeral of the two boys.
sentences.cn: 数百名哀悼者参加了那两个男孩的葬礼。

sentences.en: Hundreds of people attended the funeral.
sentences.cn: 数百人参加了葬礼。

sentences.en: Laughing and joking are improper at a funeral.
sentences.cn: 葬礼时大笑和开玩笑是不合适的。

sentences.en: Most of those attending the funeral stood silently showing little emotion.
sentences.cn: 出席葬礼的人大多都面无表情地静静站着。

sentences.en: Nelson’s funeral procession down the Thames
sentences.cn: 沿泰晤士河而下为纳尔逊送葬的队伍

sentences.en: None of my business, I guess. It's your funeral.
sentences.cn: 我想是不关我什么事儿，你就自寻死路吧。

sentences.en: Ramdas set fire to the funeral pyre .
sentences.cn: 拉姆达斯点燃了火葬柴堆。

sentences.en: Several presidents attended the funeral.
sentences.cn: 好几位总统参加了葬礼。

sentences.en: Sing up , fellows, this is supposed to be a celebration, not a funeral!
sentences.cn: 伙计们,大声唱, 这是开庆祝会, 不是送葬!

sentences.en: The funeral made its way slowly through the silent streets.
sentences.cn: 送葬的队伍缓缓地穿过肃静的街道.

sentences.en: The funeral will be carried out this afternoon at 3.00.
sentences.cn: 葬礼将在今天下午3点举行。

sentences.en: The funeral will be held at St. Martin’s Church.
sentences.cn: 葬礼将在圣马丁教堂举行。

sentences.en: the minister who conducted the funeral service
sentences.cn: 主持葬礼的牧师

sentences.en: The priest wore a purple vestment to conduct the funeral services.
sentences.cn: 牧师穿上紫色法衣主持葬礼仪式.

sentences.en: The spokesman would not reveal any details about the location or time of the funeral.
sentences.cn: 这位发言人不愿再透露有关葬礼地点和时间的任何细节。

sentences.en: Thousands of people attended the funeral.
sentences.cn: 数千人参加了葬礼。

words.tran_cn: 悲哀的；送葬的；适合葬礼的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［用于提醒某人须对本人的不智行动或决定自负责任］后果由…自负

trans.tran_cn: 葬礼，丧礼，〈比喻〉不愉快的事，操心的事，有关系的事
trans.tran_en: a religious ceremony for burying or  cremating (= burning )  someone who has died
